comment: Not a fan. Harsh, astringent, high peat, high smoke. Flavor overpowered by smoke.

Wow, wife really thought this one was harsh and rough and young. Put her in a bad mood and left no window opening for me. Had to turn on the charm that night and pry open the window with a Lag Distillers Edition ....my go to when the foreplay is rough like this scotch. Probably tastes like ass...peaty ass.
